title: Largest cities in Ukraine 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Residents in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and lowest at Month Mariupol'.
There is a difference of 2.46 between the maximum Month Kyïv (Kiev) and minimum Month Mariupol'.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Residents in millions 2.91 is found at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and the minimum is found at Mariupol' where Month is 0.45.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Residents in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and lowest at Month Mariupol'.
There is a difference of 2.46 between the maximum Month Kyïv (Kiev) and minimum Month Mariupol'.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Residents in millions 2.91 is found at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and the minimum is found at Mariupol' where Month is 0.45.
Second maximum Residents in millions is found at Month Charkiv.
There is a difference of 2.46 between the maximum Month Kyïv (Kiev) and minimum Month Mariupol'.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) is higher than any other Months with value 2.91, followed by Charkiv, and Odėsa. Down to Month Mariupol' with the lowest value 0.45.
The Residents in millions has declined over the past 10 Months.
The Month Kyïv (Kiev) has 2.81 times more Residents in millions than average.
The Residents in millions is 10.35 if we add up values of all Months.
